name: 無機化學專題討論（二）
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程開放上修
description: Knowledge of current movements and interests in Inorganic Chemistry Capable of reviewing a research area and able to present it
goals: Knowledge of current movements and interests in Inorganic ChemistryCapable of reviewing a research area and able to present it
syllabus: Current literature For years 2010-2020, the topics may include but not limit to the following: 1. Inorganic compounds with quintuple bonds 2. Molecular wire 3. Ruthenium complexes and dye-sensitized solar cell 4. Metal cluster and conductivities. 5. Oxygenase and model compounds
